short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fun facts on Thanksgiving and put feathers on the Turkey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Thanksgiving & Turkey" extension shows interesting facts about Thanksgiving with images. Thanksgiving is a national holiday in the US and it is also celebrated in Canada. Also, the Turkey in this app needs a few feathers. Play with a dice or generate a random number and choose the feather color corresponding to the number to decorate the Turkey. But do not make Turkey angry by trying to touch its eyes. Check out Turkey when you click the dice and get the number 0 or 'All'.
